amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5505, under the order of 9/15/22, agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5505 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Tester. (consideration: CR S4812; text: CR S4812) In the nature of a substitute.
